movies.title: La dame aux camélias
movies.plot: Marguerite Gautier is a courtesan in Paris. She falls deeply in love with a young man of promise, Armand Duval. When Armand's father begs her not to ruin his hopes of a career and position by marrying Armand, she acquiesces and leaves her lover. However, when poverty and terminal illness overwhelm her, Marguerite discovers that Armand has not lost his love for her.
movies.simplePlot: Marguerite Gautier is a courtesan in Paris. She falls deeply in love with a young man of promise, Armand Duval. When Armand's father begs her not to ruin his hopes of a career and position ...

biography.bio: Yvonne Printemps was born on July 25, 1894 in Ermont, Val d'Oise, Île-de-France, France as Yvonne Wigniolle. She was an actress, known for La dame aux camélias (1934), Three Waltzes (1938) and Paris Waltz (1950). She was married to Sacha Guitry. She died on January 18, 1977 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France.
biography.name: Yvonne Printemps

biography.bio: Pierre Fresnay was born on April 4, 1897 in Paris, France as Pierre Jules Louis Laudenbach. He was an actor and writer, known for La Grande Illusion (1937), Le Corbeau (1943) and The Man Who Knew Too Much (1934). He was married to Rachel Bérendt. He died on January 9, 1975 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, Hauts-de-Seine, Île-de-France, France.
biography.name: Pierre Fresnay

biography.bio: Jane Marken was born on January 13, 1895 in Paris, Ile-de-France, France as Jeanne Berthe Adolphine Crabbe. She was an actress, known for Children of Paradise (1945), ...And God Created Woman (1956) and A Day in the Country (1936). She died on December 1, 1976 in Paris.
biography.name: Jane Marken

biography.bio: Lugné-Poe was born on December 27, 1869 in San Francisco, California, USA as Aurélien-Marie Lugné-Poë. He was an actor, known for La dame aux camélias (1934), Papa sans le savoir (1932) and Chipée (1938). He was married to Suzanne Desprès. He died on June 19, 1940 in Avignon, Vaucluse, France.
biography.name: Lugné-Poe

biography.bio: Roland Armontel was born on December 7, 1904 in Vimoutiers, Orne, France as Auguste Magnien. He was an actor, known for The Beast (1975), Sur un arbre perché (1971) and Ni vu, ni connu (1958). He died on March 2, 1983 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Roland Armontel

biography.bio: André Dubosc was born on March 30, 1866 in Paris, France. He was an actor, known for L'argent des pauvres (1914), Mademoiselle 100 millions (1913) and Le grand jeu (1934). He died on December 20, 1935 in Paris.
biography.name: André Dubosc

biography.bio: Armand Lurville was born on March 21, 1875 in Paris, France as Armand Barouch Josephson. He was an actor, known for The Passion of Joan of Arc (1928), Le mariage aux épingles (1911) and Hôtel du Nord (1938). He died on September 25, 1955 in Paris.
biography.name: Armand Lurville

biography.bio: Irma Génin was born on February 20, 1896 in Périgueux, Dordogne, France as Irma Marcelle Genin. She was an actress, known for Le meurtrier de Théodore (1921), La dame aux camélias (1934) and Le maître de forges (1933). She died on March 20, 1974 in Nice, Alpes-Maritimes, France.
biography.name: Irma Génin

biography.birthName: Andrée Rose Godard de la Bigne
biography.bio: Andrée Lafayette was born in 1903 in Normandy, France as Andrée Rose Godard de la Bigne. She was an actress, known for Rue de la paix (1927), Trilby (1923) and Casanovas Erbe (1928). She was married to Arthur May Constant. She died on October 3, 1989 in Équemauville, Calvados, France.
biography.name: Andrée Lafayette

biography.bio: Renée Sénac is an actress, known for La dame aux camélias (1934) and Paris Waltz (1950).
biography.name: Renée Sénac

biography.bio: Eddy Debray was born on December 19, 1880 in Nantes, Loire-Atlantique, France as Ernest Charles Séchez. He was an actor, known for The Rules of the Game (1939), The Story of the Fox (1930) and Pension Mimosas (1935). He died on April 14, 1974 in Beaumont-les-Autels, Eure-et-Loir, France.
biography.name: Eddy Debray

biography.bio: Pierre Morin was born in 1896. He is known for his work on L'agonie des aigles (1952), La dame aux camélias (1934) and Inside a Girls' Dormitory (1953). He died in 1987.
biography.name: Pierre Morin

biography.bio: Rivers Cadet was born on March 1, 1892 in Paris, France as Jean-Maurice Large. He was an actor, known for Bonne chance! (1935), Louise (1939) and Topaze (1951). He died on November 1, 1968 in Issy-les-Moulineaux, Hauts-de-Seine, France.
biography.name: Rivers Cadet

biography.bio: Janine Berry is an actress, known for La dame aux camélias (1934), Les Visiteurs du Soir (1942) and Moscow Nights (1934).
biography.name: Janine Berry

biography.bio: Christiane Isola is an actress, known for Famille nombreuse (1934), The Virgin Bride (1937) and La dame aux camélias (1934).
biography.name: Christiane Isola
